title: type of variable passed into json decode changes
body:
I tried to use functions to create the right structures for json decoding, this constructor function has a `func() interface{}` signature. After calling `json.Decode` with a pointer pointing to a struct created by this function, the type of the variable will be `map[string]interface{}` and not the given struct anymore.
Here's a complete example to reproduce this:
https://play.golang.org/p/PQwC4tu71E
